titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: ACTIVITY RESOURCE IDENTIFIER FOR PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING - Description

div.p: A unique identifier to report ACTIVITY PROPERTY components such as staffing, supplies, systems and facilities, used to deliver care activities to a PATIENT, for the purposes of reporting Patient Level Information Costing. The unique identifier is generated through the costing process (mapping and local Patient Level Information Costing system).
